entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:04AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SALMON RIVER ON THE RISE... A glacier dammed lake outburst has started on the Salmon river near Hyder as the Summit Lake has begun to drain. The water levels on the Salmon River will continue to rise over the next day or so, cresting Wednesday into Thursday. Inherent uncertainty in these events result in varying crest height and timing issues.
